item.title: Handling Redirects in Nuxt.js through Middleware
item.description: I recently published an article about how to handle redirects in Laravel, since I also use Nuxt.js I thought it would be good to write up how to handle redirects simplistically through pure Nuxt (no server, no advanced configuration). To do this we’ll need to leverage the serverMiddleware, you can learn more about this from the official Nuxt.js docs, but in short, it allows for us to handle additional routes that aren’t defined within the folder structure (for example an API).
